DOC.criteria: Coronary artery disease Hyperlipidemia OR Healthy adult Unstable angina , myocardial infarction revascularization within 3 month Symptomatic heart failure Creatinine > 3.0 mg/dl Liver enzymes > 3X upper limit normal Chronic hypoxia Significant anemia Chronic inflammatory disease Pregnancy Willing withdraw statins duration study
